DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , prospective , single dose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety Tamiflu ( oseltamivir ) volunteer dialysis volunteer creatinine clearance 10 30 mL/min . Volunteers receive single oral dose Tamiflu .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Tamiflu Volunteers Dialysis And Volunteers With Reduced Creatinine Clearance
DOC.criteria: General Adult volunteer , age 19 90 year Medically stable hospitalization significant disease 3 month study start Volunteers dialysis A document wellestablished dialysis therapy Volunteers reduce creatinine clearance Creatinine clearance 10 30 mL/min Stable renal function Clinically significant unstable disease ( e.g. , cardiac , hepatic , pulmonary ) Medical history concurrent medical condition would compromise participation study Hypotensive episodes symptom fainting , dizziness lightheadedness 4 week screen Uncontrolled hypotension hypertension Infection hepatitis B , hepatitis C human immunodeficiency virus
